title: Add support for MS-Logon UltraVNC
author: tjgng
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
As per https://mremoteng.atlassian.net/browse/MR-328 it would be nice to be able to save and provide domain username and password to pass onto VNC.

comments.author: nagash79

comments.snippet:
> if somebody is still looking for this I'm using a workaround:
> 
> ![mremoteng - confcons xml](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33110530/53185612-5a3c9b80-35cd-11e9-966a-d6833bcb59bc.jpg)
> 
> like this I can use one external tool for all PCs that are using the same credentials with username and password (e.g. in domain)

Have you found a way to bring VNC to the foreground when connecting? If I choose to integrate it will bring it to the foreground sometimes, other times it will...
comments.author: tjgng

comments.snippet:
As commented on the linked thread in the first comment VncSharpNG does not support MS-Logon, thats why the username field is not visible.
We will have to get rid of VNCSharp before being able to implement this, so it depends on #2025
comments.author: farosch
